content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore, connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between the Iron Chest and the Stone Furnace.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) transferring items between entities.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal and Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal, connected to a Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0).
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between entities.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters have a continuous supply of source items to operate efficiently. Check the supply chain and inventory to ensure that items are available for transfer.

### Full Output Warnings
- Regularly check and empty the output slots of furnaces and chests to prevent production halts due to full inventories. This will ensure continuous production and avoid warnings related to full output.

### No Ingredients to Smelt Warnings
- Ensure that furnaces have a steady supply of raw materials to smelt. Monitor the input inventory of furnaces to avoid idle time and increase production efficiency.
